topic.title: Conclusion
topic.shortdesc: This section includes a wrap-up of the evaluation, as well as an overall grade.

body.p: It is evident that the group worked very hard on the project. They succeeded in creating a user-friendly webpage on recreational sports - one that we think is a lot less overwhelming than the official VT Recreational Sports page. The project was free from any significant errors, and the content was accurate, current, and informative. Overall, the group managed to produce solid, professional work. Areas of improvement included minor editing mishaps and organizational issues.
We believe this project deserves the following grade: A.
